articles.title: Ben Davis comes back to haunt Singapore as Thailand claim massive first win at Southeast Asian Games - ESPN
articles.description: Thailand have claimed their first win at the 31st Southeast Asian Games with a crushing 5-0 rout of Singapore in Group B on Monday.
